name: Jumping Slime 2D
description:
Jumping Slime is an action arcade platformer full of exciting adventures, challenging obstacles, and priceless treasure!

Boost your skills, practice to win, and don’t forget about the gold! You can exchange it for new heroes and build the tallest tower ever!
Store your most powerful weapons or magic spells in the tower to leave the enemy with no chance to survive!
Find chests with all manner of unique treasure along the way!
Just tap the screen, and you’re off to overcome obstacles or attack your enemies!

Very easy controls: just click and jump!

You don’t need an internet connection to play. Challenge yourself anywhere and anytime!

Accept the challenge and walk your path to victory!

Features:

- Immersive storyline
- Awesome graphics
- Fantastic gameplay
- User-friendly controls
- Unique style
